name: generate_counterargument
description: Generate steel-manned counterarguments grounded in one or more specific thinkers (Sartre, Nietzsche, Camus, Dostoevsky, Emerson, Jefferson, Voltaire, Paine, Milton, Rawls, Campbell).

position.description: The argument or claim to respond to.

traditions.description: Which thinkers or traditions should shape the counterargument. If empty, the tool will select relevant ones automatically.
